channel.title: Affiliate question
channel.description:
just recently started up a new Forum Hosting service,
Would you be interested in putting a small Text link ad at the top of your Forum or in a relevant place where it will be used, in return for a banner on our affiliate page?
http://www.forum-host.net is the website, even though it's small at the moment, when it grows larger your banner will always remain there.
I sent this email also to admin@moparisthebest.com but wouldn't know how long it would take to actually get a reply, this forum seems best suited.

item.title: Affiliate question
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

You would be the only one to benefit from it…

Read full topic
